itemInfo.itemDesc:
Course dish of Balenos.
- Unique effect: 110 minutes of :
 Movement Speed Rank +2
 Fishing Speed Rank +2
 Gathering Speed Rank +2

- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.

item.name: Cheese Gratin
item.desc:
Various ingredients have been roasted with cheese on them. 
- Unique effect: Max HP +70 for 90min
 Attack Speed Rank +1 for 90min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Meat Croquette
item.desc:
A fried dish with grain and meat. 

- Unique Effect: Combat EXP Increase +5% for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Smoked Fish Steak
item.desc:
Dish with smoked fish. 
- Unique effect: Attack Speed Rank +1 for 60min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Stir-Fried Vegetables
item.desc:
A spicy dish with stir-fried hot peppers and vegetables. 

- Unique Effect: Jump Height Increase for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Beer
item.desc:
A weak liquor with grains. 

- Unique Effect: Restore +2 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map).

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1sec
